name: cache guild
longDescription: Fetches information from the guild found through the provided query. The list of guilds are the guilds where the bot is in.

options.name: query
options.description: The query to search for or just drop the guild id.

name: cache user
longDescription: Fetches information from the user found through the provided query. The list of users are the users that are in the guilds where the bot is in.

options.name: query
options.description: The query to search for or just drop the user id.

name: github user
shortDescription: Gives the user info about the github user
longDescription: Finds and shows the information about the provided github user. The information is fetched from the GitHub API.

options.name: username
options.description: The username of the github user

name: github repository
shortDescription: Gives the repository info about the github repository
longDescription: Finds and shows the information about the provided github repository. The information is fetched from the GitHub API.

options.name: repository
options.description: The repository of the github user

name: help commandlist
shortDescription: Shows the list of available commands
longDescription: Shows a list of all commands, their category and some bot related links.

name: help command
shortDescription: Shows information about a specific command
longDescription: Shows information about a specific command.

options.name: command
options.description: The command you want to get information about

name: run
shortDescription: Runs the javascript code that user provides
longDescription: Runs the javascript code that user provides

options.name: console
options.description: Whether to show the output in console or not (default: true)

options.name: showcode
options.description: Show the input code or not (default: true)

name: stats
longDescription: Shows the bot's statistics related to general to system information.

name: tts
longDescription: Converts text to speech. Available Languages at [GitHub](https://github.com/user-lezi/lezi-bot/tree/main/metadata/tts-languagues.json)

options.name: text
options.description: The text to convert to speech.

options.name: language
options.description: The language to convert the text to.
